homeHeader.title: Launch, Operate, and Scale Your Clean Tech Business in Masdar City Free Zone with Our One-Stop Solutions
homeHeader.description: Frustrated with Masdar City Free Zone's confusing sustainability impact statements, activity misalignments, and compliance requirements?  At One Nexuz, our expert business consultants handle all the paperwork so you can focus on sustainable innovation. Design breakthrough technology in the heart of Abu Dhabi with unrestricted access to state-of-the-art incubation hubs, advanced research and testing laboratories, and top-tier networking infrastructure.

items.title: Schedule a Free Consultation
items.description: We’ll start with a brief call to understand your business needs and goals to determine the ideal business activity and legal structure.

items.title: Prepare the Necessary Documents
items.description: Next, our consultants will help you prepare and submit the relevant documents, including passport copies, forms, and MOA.

items.description: We’ll assist you in filing the relevant paperwork with the Masdar Free Zone authority and pay the licensing fees on your behalf.

items.title: Obtain Your License
items.description: Once approved, you'll receive your Masdar City Free Zone license in 3-5 working days alongside incorporation documents.

items.title: Get Visa & Banking Support
items.description: We’ll continue to support you beyond licensing to help you secure a UAE residency visa and open a corporate bank account.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How long does it take to set up a business in Masdar City Free Zone?
items.answer: Our experts streamline all the paperwork and government coordination to help you set up in 3-5 working days.

items.question: What documents do I need to launch my Masdar City Free Zone?
items.answer: Generally, you’ll need to provide passport copies, proof of address, a business activity description, and a business plan, depending on your legal structure and selected license.

items.question: Do I need to lease or rent a physical office to secure a Masdar City FZ license?
items.answer: No, Masdar City offers alternative office solutions, including flex-desk, co-working, and virtual office spaces.

items.question: Can I apply for a UAE residence visa through my Masdar City License?
items.answer: Yes, you can apply for an investor or employee residence visa with any trade license except for a freelance permit.

items.question: Can Masdar FZ businesses trade with UAE mainland companies?
items.answer: You can trade within and beyond the Emirates with either a local distributor or a dual license.
